name: Ham Roll Ups II
author: JULIE STEVENS
summary: Cheddar cheese is blended with the usual cream cheese for these attractive little ham spirals, giving them an extra splash of flavor and color. You'll get plenty of requests for the recipe.
directions: In a medium microwave safe bowl, mix cream cheese and Cheddar cheese
Microwave on high heat approximately 45 seconds, stirring frequently until melted and smooth
Lay ham slices flat, and spread with cheese mixture
Place one green onion parallel to one edge of each ham slice
Tightly roll the ham slices into thin logs around the green onions
Slice the logs into 1/4 to 1/3 inch wide rings
Arrange rings flat on a large serving platter
